title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

items.content_html:
Avengers Infinity War Spoiler Free Review:

  • I’m amazed that so little of this movie has been widely spoiled
  • movie was fantastic. the movie somehow managed to do everything it needed to do while not doing disservice to any of the bazillion characters involved.
  • the plot moves quickly. there is no good time to pee.
  • there is one post-credits scene.
  • very happy to have watched in imax
items.summary:
Avengers Infinity War Spoiler Free Review:
 I’m amazed that so little of this movie has been widely spoiled movie was fantastic. the movie somehow managed to do everything it needed to do while not doing disservice to any of the bazillion characters involved. the plot moves quickly. there is no good time to pee. there is one post-credits scene. very happy to have watched in imax

items.content_html:
Gmorning.

You’ve got stuff in your head that no one else has got.

And you’ve got stuff in your head that you think you bear alone, but I PROMISE you share with so many.

Only way to know the difference is to spill it out.

On paper, into a mic, to a shrink, onto a canvas.

Let’s go
items.summary:
Gmorning.
You’ve got stuff in your head that no one else has got.
And you’ve got stuff in your head that you think you bear alone, but I PROMISE you share with so many.
Only way to know the difference is to spill it out.
On paper, into a mic, to a shrink, onto a canvas.
Let’s go

items.content_html: Been watching a lot of standup comedy specials on Netflix recently. My recent favorite is by a British chap I hadn’t heard of before - James Acaster. He has this way of tying together the entire act very well. (I think the episodes are out of order for some reason though)

items.content_html:
“Remember bearer bonds?”

“Yes! They were in Die Hard.”

“Why did we get rid of them?”

“Inefficient, poor liquidity, theft/operational/ML risk, and…”

“I want to put them on the block chain!”

“Why would you want that?”

“Because blockchain!”

“But they’d still be…”

“Blockchain!”
items.summary:
“Remember bearer bonds?”
“Yes! They were in Die Hard.”
“Why did we get rid of them?”
“Inefficient, poor liquidity, theft/operational/ML risk, and…”
“I want to put them on the block chain!”
“Why would you want that?”
“Because blockchain!”
“But they’d still be…”
“Blockchain!”
